text: Elatia (Greek: Ελατιά or Ancient Greek: Ἐλάτεια) may refer to: *Elatia, Drama (Ελατιά) *Elatia, Zakynthos (Ελατιά) *Elateia (Ἐλάτεια), an ancient city-state of Phocis *Elateia (Aeolis), a town of ancient Aeolis, now in Turkey *Elateia (Epirus) (Ἐλάτεια), a town of ancient Epirus *Elateia (Thessaly) (Ἐλάτεια), a town of ancient Thessaly *Elateia, Florina (Ἐλάτεια), a destroyed village in the Florina region whose artifacts are held in the Museum of Folklore and History (Drosopigi) *Elateia, Larissa (Ἐλάτεια), a village in the municipality of Larissa *Amfikleia-Elateia * (Ἐλάτεια), a village in the Phthiotis region ==See also== *Elati (disambiguation)
title: Elatia
